Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS® Immunodiagnostic Products NT-proBNP II Reagent Pack
Specimen Container(s): Serum plus clot activator plastic tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Ortho Clinical Diagnostics VITROS NT-proBNP II Reagent Pack for quantitative NT-proBNP measurement in serum and plasma to aid in heart failure diagnosis and assessment using the VITROS 3600 Immunodiagnostic System
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use for quantitative measurement of NT-proBNP in human serum and plasma (K2 EDTA or Lithium Heparin) using the VITROS 3600 Immunodiagnostic System to aid in the diagnosis and severity assessment of heart failure in diagnosed patients
